disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

talkChrEntityId.Wiki: Used as a foreign key when referencing from a conversation.

eliminateTargetEntityId.Wiki: Entity ID of the character / group to be defeated by the buddy when summoned from this stele

summonedEventFlagId.Wiki: Flag ID that stands when summoned from a stone monument. When this flag is set, the stone monument cannot be summoned.

isSpecial.Wiki: Is the stone monument an SP stone monument or a general-purpose stone monument? A bool that distinguishes.

buddyId.Wiki: ID of the buddy parameter. If Special is , this buddy ID will be summoned.

dopingSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID applied to the buddy when summoning the buddy.

activateRange.Wiki: If there is at least one character to be defeated in this range, you can summon a buddy at that stone monument.

overwriteReturnRange.Wiki: Buddy's homecoming distance can be overridden

overwriteActivateRegionEntityId.Wiki: The range where the buddy can be summoned can be overwritten in the area of the specified entity ID.
